I Love Music Ed Sheeran

When I was getting married one of my only responsibilities, besides painting what seemed like 10,000 bottles rose gold, was putting together music for the reception. I had been trying to find the perfect song for our “First Dance” and had narrowed it down to a couple, including one by Ed Sheeran, but hadn’t found one that was perfect. Two weeks before the wedding I’m setting on the couch looking at my phone and I get a notification from YouTube about a new video for a song called Perfect by Ed Sheeran. This was the exact song I was looking for. We danced to it at our wedding and we still dance to it now.

Recently this song has hit different for me. Lately I've been kinda depressed, feeling like my life has no purpose the way I'm living it. I lost both my friends (not in death, but to bad addictions and life choices that they made that caused us to drift apart) and all I do is work and play video games. Then I went to my cousins engagement party and saw her brides maid. This girl, I've known her for some time, we're both the same age, our parents have known each other before we were born, and my mom even suggested her as someone I should ask out, which I blew off. But seeing this girl for the first time in years... it just sparked something in me.  No longer did my life feel as depressing. Suddenly I'm eager to accomplish goals that I've been putting off for to long and actually do something meaningful with my life. I then look up her social pages just to get more of an idea of what's she like nowadays and try to understand why I'm interested in her, and I'm surprised to find that she posses tons of the qualities I was hoping to find in a future partner. She's cute, has a nice personality (these two I already new), is spiritual, loves geeky stuff like Marvel and Star Wars, and shares some similar hobbies. She just feels...perfect. I wanna ask her out, but I strongly feel I should work on straightening out my life some more before attempting to start such a relationship.

I was with this girl for a bit more than 5 years. 
When we fell in love,  it was something that you only see in films, a love that only Elvis himself would sing about.
Things got so beautiful we thought it was indeed unreal, we were only kids when it all happened, but eventually we grew up together. I loved her since the day I saw her, 5 years later we are on our own separate way, but not because there was no more love between us, because people sometimes need to separate to understand how love works.
I learned so much from her, she fascinated me with every words she said. Love does help you grow up, it helps you understand why life is wonderful and so precious. I made a choice of loving her, then, now and forever. Love might be a feeling for some, but for me is more than that, is a commitment, something that you are proud of and something that you can always be happy about. I owe her all my happiness and all my beautiful memories.  I always wanted to see myself getting older next to her, but nobody can guarantee our next day. I guess happy-ever after is notfor everyone.
I'm not the guy to write stuff like this, but this song really makes me think of her and all our memories that we have together. I couldn't imagine a better love story than the one we had; Thanks Ed Sheeran for this song, and thanks to the love of my life for making me the man I am today. 
May God help you all find the one to make you better.

I found a girl she was a love of my life back in 2005 in a little bar in Oklahoma she was a bartender a friend introduced me to her me being so shy I finally got the courage to ask her out she said yes we were only together for 3 months until Fusion needs to go back to her home state to take care of her dad but a few years later she come back by that time my mom was diagnosed with cancer she was dying how to take care of her 24 hours I didn't want to burden her with my problems so it actually when I saw her again like I didn't want to see her you look in her eyes when she drove away she was the love of my life and I let her go I'm writing this in hopes you might see this man can't forgive me it's been 16 years since that summer night we first met where is my little day that I don't think about her maybe this is just a lost cause she might not see this but I had to get it off my chest I still live at the same place I just wish you the happiness I would like to see her again love always Jason

I met a girl in my College. We became bestfriends!! And I had a crush on her!! From past few days we came too close and I don't know I was just in love with that feeling!! She called me her soulmate!! And me dumbfuck who doesn't even know that soulmate doesn't mean lover!! It means a person who helps you in every thing and stay with you in every worst situation!! I thought she loves me too!! We were sharing quotes to eachother I was writing liness for her!! Everything was so good until that day!!! I don't know what I was thinking that day I wrote it all!! Bruh I wrote every damn feeling.... And Damn she said - "My heart is already broken I would never let anyone hurt it anymore!! I told you you're my soulmate just soulmate! And I think you can't be my soulmate now!!! I'm sorry!!..." Yeah!! And now it's never the same as it was before!! I destroyed everything as I destroye everytime!! I became what I feared the most I became the same as every other guy!! I only wished that i could make her happy and I want to give every damn thing she deserves!! (ofcourse she deserves better than me, still..) And now I'm  just arguing with myself - whyyy!! Whyyy! Why would you tell her your feelings!! Why would you open up!! And sometimes I think - did I do something wrong?? Wouldn't it have been good if I never told her?? Where I have gone wrong!! Sometimes I just wish that this were just a nightmare that i could wake up from. Hey is this really true that every love is a loosing game??? I don't know what I'm supposed to do now!!! I'm just empty!! Looks like god does not have any plans for my relationship status!!
I feel like - "I'm in a field of dandelions
Wishing on every one that you'll be mine!!
Anyways let it be!! Life goes on!!! Bro i can't tell you she is sooooo cuteeeee!! And I love her 🙂😩
In the end to the every person who is reading this heyy thanks alot there's noone whom I can tell this So thank you!! Don't have a good day have a great day!!!
